pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.funnel
====================================

.. py:module:: pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.funnel


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   pyecharts.charts.basic_charts.funnel.Funnel


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: Funnel(init_opts: pyecharts.types.Init = opts.InitOpts(), render_opts: pyecharts.types.RenderInit = opts.RenderOpts())

   Bases: :py:obj:`pyecharts.charts.chart.Chart`


   <<< Funnel >>>

   Funnel diagram is suitable for one-way analysis of single process
   with standardized business process, long cycle and multiple links.
   Through comparison of business data of each link in the funnel,
   the link where the potential problems can be found intuitively,
   and then decisions can be made.


   .. py:method:: add(series_name: str, data_pair: pyecharts.types.Sequence, *, color: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = None, color_by: pyecharts.types.Optional[str] = None, min_: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 0, max_: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 100, min_size: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric] = '0%', max_size: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric] = '100%', orient: str = 'vertical', sort_: str = 'descending', gap: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 0, is_legend_hover_link: bool = True, funnel_align: str = 'center', label_opts: pyecharts.types.Label = opts.LabelOpts(), tooltip_opts: pyecharts.types.Tooltip = None, itemstyle_opts: pyecharts.types.ItemStyle = None, emphasis_opts: pyecharts.types.Emphasis = None, selected_mode: pyecharts.types.Union[bool, str] = False, z_level: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 0, z: pyecharts.types.Numeric = 2, pos_top: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, pos_left: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, pos_bottom: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, pos_right: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, width: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, height: pyecharts.types.Union[str, pyecharts.types.Numeric, None] = None, dataset_index: pyecharts.types.Optional[pyecharts.types.Numeric] = None, encode: pyecharts.types.Union[pyecharts.types.JSFunc, dict, None] = None, markpoint_opts: pyecharts.types.MarkPoint = None, markline_opts: pyecharts.types.MarkLine = None, markarea_opts: pyecharts.types.MarkArea = None)
